item.description:
Let's try to get several LTEs in each week. It's really simple - write something short and sweet about how you support Dr Paul. Submit it to as many newspapers as you want, listed below. Please then RSVP, and feel free to add your LTE in the text of the RSVP. This will be a a recurring appointment.

Concord Monitor
Email: letters@cmonitor.com
Snail Mail: P. O. Box 177, Concord, 03302
Fax: 603.224.8120

Dover Community News
Email: dcn@seacoastonline.com
Snail Mail: Dover Community News, PO Box 1987, Dover, NH 03821
Fax: 603.679.8916

Foster?s Daily Democrat
Email: letters@fosters.com
Snail Mail: 333 Central Ave, Dover, 03820
Fax: 603.749.4029

Keene Sentinel
Email: news@keenesentinel.com
Snail Mail: 60 West St., Keene, 03431
Fax: 603.352.0437

Laconia Citizen
Email: letters@citizen.com
Snail Mail: 171 Fair St., Laconia, NH 03246
Fax: 603.527.3593

Laconia Daily Sun
Email: news@laconiadailysun.com
Snail Mail: 65 Water Street, Laconia, NH 03246
Fax: 603.527.0056

Meredith News
Email: mnews@salmonpress.com
Snail Mail: P.O. Box 729, Meredith, NH 03253

Nashua Telegraph
Email: letters@telegraph-nh.com
Snail Mail: P. O. Box 1008, Nashua, 03061
Fax: 603.882.5138

The New Hampshire
Online Form: Letters
Snail Mail: Rm 156 Memorial Union Bld., UNH, 83 Main St., Durham NH, 03824
Fax: 603.862.1920

Portsmouth Herald
Email: news@seacoastonline.com
Snail mail: 111 Maplewood Avenue, Portsmouth, 03801
Fax: 603.427.0550

Rockingham News
Email: rockinghamnews@seacoastonline.com
Snail Mail: Rockingham News, PO Box 1104, Hampton, NH 03842
Fax: 603.772.3830

Union Leader
Email: letters@theunionleader.com
Snail Mail: Attention: Letters to the Editor, P. O. Box 955 Manchester, 03108-9555

Valley News
Email: forum@vnews.com
Snail Mail: The Forum, The Valley News, P. O. Box 877 White River Junction, VT 05001
Fax: 603.298.0212

Weirs Times
Email: mailboat@weirs.com
Fax: 603.366.7301
item.name: Write an LTE
